tagline: Intelligent flashcard system with FSRS spaced repetition algorithm. Create an account to use the app.
forgotPasswordHint: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPasswordSuccess: If an account exists for this email, you will receive a password reset link.
resetPasswordSuccess: Password has been reset. You can sign in with your new password.
resetPasswordInvalidLink: Invalid or expired reset link. Please request a new one.
createDeckCategoriesHint: Comma- or newline-separated. Created if they don't exist and linked to this deck. New cards in this deck can get these categories.
createCardDeckCategoriesHint: This card will be added to: {{names}}.
title: Title
noDecks: No decks yet. Create your first deck to get started.
categoriesIntro: Create categories to tag cards (e.g. vocabulary, grammar). Assign them to cards from the deck or when editing a card.
deleteCategoryConfirmMessage: This category will be removed from all cards.
studyRatingHelpIntro: Choose the button that best matches:
studyRatingAgainDesc: You were not satisfied with your recall (forgot all or part of the answer, got it wrong, etc.).
studyRatingHardDesc: You remembered the answer but with difficulty.
studyRatingGoodDesc: You remembered the answer with reasonable effort.
studyRatingEasyDesc: You knew it instantly with no effort (the card felt trivial).
studyAllCardsReviewed: Congratulations! You've reviewed all cards in this deck for now.
decksIntro: Your decks. Create a deck to start adding cards and studying.
deckShowKnowledgeOnCreate: Propose a reversed card when creating
editDeckCategoriesEmpty: No categories yet. Create some in Settings or when creating a deck.
editDeckCategoriesHint: Default categories for new cards in this deck. You can still assign categories per card.
deleteDeckConfirmMessage: The deck and its cards will be removed. This cannot be undone.
flaggedCardsIntro: Cards you marked as needing management during study.
flaggedCardsEmpty: No cards marked as needing management.
frontBackRequiredBoth: Front and back are required for both cards.
createCardHint: e.g. question on front, answer on back
knowledgePlaceholder: Optional context or note for this card pair
generateReversedCardHint: Side-by-side for easy comparison. Save or create each card independently.
noCardsYet: No cards yet. Add a card to start learning.
cardDetailsShortFsrsHint: Learning phase: stability in minutes, next review soon.
cardDetailsLongFsrsHint: Long-term schedule: stability in days, retrievability over time.
cardDetailsTimingGraphHint: Events on a timeline (left = oldest, right = newest). Hover for details.
cardDetailsReviewTimingGraphHint: Revisions on a timeline (left = oldest, right = newest). Hover for date, rating and interval.
cardsContentHidden: Card content is hidden here to protect active recall. Study the deck to see and review cards.
noCardsToStudy: No cards to study right now.
addCardsOrComeBack: Add cards to this deck or come back later for due reviews.
failedSaveReview: Failed to save review. Try again.
optimizerIntro: Personalize FSRS weights from your review history. Run the optimizer when you have enough reviews.
optimizerInstallHint: Install with: pipx install fsrs-optimizer (or use a Python venv).
optimizerFirstRunHint: First run needs {{min}} total reviews for stable weights.
optimizerSubsequentHint: Next run: {{min}} new reviews or {{days}} days since last run.
shortTermOptimizerIntro: Learning parameters are tuned by this optimizer, not manually. Run it when you have enough learning-phase reviews.
shortTermOptimizerSubsequentHint: Next run: {{min}} new learning reviews or {{days}} days since last run.
shortTermNotEnoughReviews: Not enough learning-phase reviews. Need {{min}}, have {{count}}.
revealAllDialogMessage: To manage cards with minimal impact on recall, we recommend studying the deck first. Then come back and reveal cards to edit. Continue to reveal all?
deleteCardConfirmMessage: This card will be permanently deleted. This cannot be undone.
treatAsNewConfirmMessage: This card will be reset and shown as new in the next study session.
expandDelayConfirmMessage: You saw this card outside of study. Push the next review date forward to account for the exposure?
manageReviewedBanner: You just reviewed {{count}} cards. Manage them below.
bulkDeleteConfirmMessage: These cards will be permanently deleted. This cannot be undone.
noReviewedCards: No cards from your last session in this deck.
studySessionsIntro: View your recent sessions and check that your data is in sync.
statsIntro: Your review activity over the last {{days}} days.
studySessionSelectPrompt: Select a session to inspect details.
studySessionTimingGraphHint: Events on a timeline (left = start of session, right = end). Hover for time and label.
studyHealthDashboardIntro: Overview of your review activity, session consistency, and service status.
adminIntro: User management: block users, assign roles. Visible only to administrators. Technical panels (e.g. feature flags) are in the Dev area.
adminUserManagementComingSoon: User list, block, and role assignment — coming soon.
adminAccessDeniedMessage: This page is for administrators only. If you need access, contact your administrator.
devIntro: Technical APIs and reserved panels: feature flags, rollouts, per-user overrides. Visible only to users with the dev role.
devOnlyNotice: This area is for developers only. You can enable or disable flags, set rollout percentage, and add per-user overrides. All changes are recorded in the audit log. Admins cannot access this panel.
devExplanationEnabled: Enabled: When checked, the feature is considered on. Who actually gets it depends on rollout % and per-user overrides below.
devExplanationRollout: Rollout %: Share of users (without an override) who receive the feature. 0 = no one, 100 = everyone. Use for gradual or canary rollouts.
devExplanationOverrides: Per-user overrides: Force the feature on or off for specific user IDs, regardless of rollout. Use for beta testers or disabling for one user. Overrides win over rollout.
devExplanationAudit: Audit: Every change here is logged with your user ID and timestamp. Changes affect real users; use this panel responsibly.
devAccessDeniedMessage: This page is for developers only. If you need access, contact your team.
devDbIntro: Applied Liquibase changesets (read-only). Run migrations from the project root with the commands below.
devDbCommandDocker: Apply pending migrations (Docker, e.g. when using docker compose)
settingsAccountReadOnly: Account details are read-only here. Change email or password from the sign-in flow.
settingsAwayMinutesHint: If you leave the tab for longer than this, the session will end. Between 5 seconds and this limit, the session pauses and you can resume.
